long_description: The Woods Chilkoot 8 Tent provides a spacious and easy-to-set-up home away from home for up to 8 people on your family's 3-season camping adventures. 2 main doors; vestibule storage on inner tent door; power-cord pass through. 1000mm waterproofing; taped seams. No-see-um mesh; 2 chimney vents. The Woods Chilkoot 8 Tent comes with a full accessory bag, stakes and guylines. Overstock.
short_description: The Woods Chilkoot 8 Tent provides a spacious and easy-to-set-up home away from home for up to 8 people on your family's 3-season camping adventures.
